item.title: Ciutat Vella Travel Guide (Barcelona/Barcelona (province)/Catalonia/Eastern Spain/Spain/Iberia/Europe)
item.description: Explore the historic district of Ciutat Vella in Barcelona, Spain with this comprehensive travel guide complete with a list of places to visit, hiking/biking routes, food and drink scene, local culture, and more.

item.title: Rach Gia Travel Guide (Southern Vietnam/Vietnam/Southeast Asia/Asia)
item.description: Plan your visit to Rach Gia, Vietnam with our comprehensive travel guide. Explore cultural and natural attractions, discover hiking and biking routes, sample local food and drink, and more.

item.title: Mount Hiei Travel Guide (Shiga/Kansai/Japan/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Plan your trip to Mount Hiei, Japan with our comprehensive guide featuring top attractions, hiking/biking routes, best things to do, where to stay, local culture, safety tips, and more.

item.title: Henderson Travel Guide (Western Coal Fields/Kentucky/South/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Explore the culturally important attractions, natural wonders, hiking and biking routes, best things to do, food scene, where to stay, local culture, and transportation options of Henderson, Kentucky, in this comprehensive travel guide.

item.title: Bensalem Travel Guide (Bucks County/Philadelphia Region/Pennsylvania/Mid-Atlantic/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best things to do, see, eat, and experience in Bensalem, Pennsylvania with this comprehensive travel guide.

item.title: Thomastown Travel Guide (County Kilkenny/Southeast Ireland/Ireland/Britain and Ireland/Europe)
item.description: Discover the cultural and natural attractions, hiking and biking routes, food and drink scene, local culture and customs, as well as transportation options and logistics in the charming town of Thomastown, County Kilkenny, Ireland.

item.title: Manovo-Gounda St Floris National Park Travel Guide (Central African Republic/Central Africa/Africa)
item.description: A comprehensive travel guide to Manovo-Gounda St Floris National Park, including information on places to visit, hiking/biking routes, activities and tours, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture and customs, safety and health, transportation options, and nearby destinations.

item.title: East Providence Travel Guide (Providence County/Rhode Island/New England/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, things to do, where to stay, what to buy, local culture and customs, safety and health, and transportation options in East Providence.

item.title: Grasmere Travel Guide (Cumbria/North West England/England/United Kingdom/Britain and Ireland/Europe)
item.description: Experience the picturesque village of Grasmere in Cumbria, North West England. From food and drink, to cultural and natural attractions, to safety and health information, this comprehensive travel guide has everything you need to know to plan your trip.

item.title: Zion National Park Travel Guide (Utah/Southwest/United States of America/North America)
item.description: Discover the best places to visit, things to do, and tips for a memorable trip at Zion National Park. This tour guide covers everything you need to know about the park from hiking routes, cultural attractions, accommodations, to local culture and customs.
